message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110, which is still a great deal for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your flexibility. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $105?
I really like the product, and I'm willing to make a final offer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to give up on getting a better price. How about we meet at $99?
